item.title: Arquitetura M (Rinha)
item.description: Http framework and application built from scratch with C. featuring: concurrent API implementation, reverse proxy and, PostgreSQL database implentation. Submission for https://github.com/zanfranceschi/rinha-de-backend-2024-q1

item.title: PokeGelo-CLI
item.description: PokeGelo-CLI is a command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to simplify sending HTTP requests, making it easier and more intuitive compared to using curl & more flexible compared to postman.
